movies.title: The Frog Prince
movies.plot: When a moody royal Prince's party of court brats pulls a few pranks too many in the woods, a mean fairy lays a cruel spell. She turns one into a frog, who can only become human again by a loving kiss. This alters several lives through relationships, some of dynastic relevance.
movies.simplePlot: When a moody royal Prince's party of court brats pulls a few pranks too many in the woods, a mean fairy lays a cruel spell. She turns one into a frog, who can only become human again by a ...

biography.bio: Iris Berben was born on August 12, 1950 in Detmold, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. She is an actress, known for Rosa Roth (1994), Eddie the Eagle (2016) and Noces d'argent (2006).
biography.name: Iris Berben

biography.bio: Managed to survive the Nazi terror regime together with his mother. While his father was deported to a concentration camp and died shortly after World War II, they were hidden by friends in Berlin. Published his critically acclaimed autobiography "Nicht alle waren Mörder - Eine Kindheit in Berlin" (Not everyone was a murderer - A childhood in Berlin) in 1999. After studying acting in Berlin, he made his stage debut at the Deutsches Theater in Berlin. In the following decades, he collaborated with some of the most important stage directors in Germany such as Bertolt Brecht, Rudolf Noelte or Peter Zadek. Is portrayed by Aaron Altaras on Nicht alle waren Mörder (2006) (TV), the movie about his childhood. Degen is married for the third time, his second wife was the actress Dora Degen Borkoff, they have two children: Adina and Jakob Degen. He's also the father of Elisabeth Degen (actress) and Gabi Degen (first marriage).
biography.name: Michael Degen

biography.bio: Linda Rybová was born on November 10, 1975 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Ordinace v ruzové zahrade (2005), Dark Blue World (2001) and Most (2003).
biography.name: Linda Rybová

biography.bio: Michal Dlouhý was born on September 29, 1968 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for The Velvet Murderers (2005), Kajinek (2010) and Goat Story (2008).
biography.name: Michal Dlouhý

biography.bio: Therese Herz was born on May 10, 1960 in Prague, Czechoslovakia as Terezie Pokorná. She is an actress and assistant director, known for Amadeus (1984), Die dumme Augustine (1993) and Galose stastia (1986).
biography.name: Therese Herz

biography.bio: Karel Greif was born on September 23, 1963 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Tajomstvo stastia (1995), O Popelákovi (1986) and Tri princezny tanecnice (1984).
biography.name: Karel Greif

biography.bio: Jirí Sovák was born on December 27, 1920 in Prague, Czechoslovakia as Jirí Schmitzer. He was an actor and writer, known for Kolya (1996), Marecku, Pass Me the Pen! (1976) and Who Wants to Kill Jessie? (1966). He died on September 6, 2000 in Prague, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Jirí Sovák

biography.bio: Nina Divísková was born on July 12, 1936 in Brno, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Vyprávej (2009), Wrong Side Up (2005) and Morgiana (1972). She is married to Jan Kacer. They have three children.
biography.name: Nina Divísková

biography.bio: Concha Cuetos was born on January 17, 1944 in Madrid, Spain as Concepción Cuetos. She is an actress, known for Farmacia de guardia (1991), Slugs (1988) and Extra Terrestrial Visitors (1983). She was previously married to Manuel Ripoll.
biography.name: Concha Cuetos

biography.bio: Lucie Zednícková was born on November 15, 1968 in Prague, Czechoslovakia as Lucie Bártová. She is an actress, known for Kour (1991), Saturnin (1994) and Das siebte Foto (2003).
biography.name: Lucie Zednícková

biography.bio: Oldrich Slavík was born on December 15, 1933 in Bélá pod Bezdézem, Ceskoslovensko. He was an actor, known for Kaspar Hauser (1993), Prokop Divis (1977) and All My Compatriots (1969). He died on June 26, 1996 in Brno, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Oldrich Slavík

biography.placeOfBirth: Námest na Hané, Czechoslovakia [now Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Ladislav Lakomý was born on November 14, 1931 in Námest na Hané, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for Zbabelec (1990), Uzavreny Okruh (1989) and Kurýr (1994). He died on April 11, 2011 in Brno, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Ladislav Lakomý

biography.bio: Ladislav Kunes is an actor, known for The Frog Prince (1991).
biography.name: Ladislav Kunes

biography.bio: Vítezslav Jandák was born on August 3, 1947 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Three Wishes for Cinderella (1973), Perníková vez (2002) and Rodeo (1973).
biography.name: Vítezslav Jandák

biography.bio: Originally from upstate NY, Michael has worked as an actor in Buffalo, Minneapolis, Detroit, New York City, and Los Angeles. He dreams of working overseas one day. He started his professional career as a member of the esteemed Guthrie Theater acting company in Garland Wright's acclaimed production of The Seagull which has been archived at Lincoln Center. Shortly after his stint there he moved to Hollywood where he continues to appear on the stages of Los Angeles while he pursues film/TV work. He also teaches acting at various studios in the area.
biography.name: Michael Matthys
